forum.content:
I'm a new soul
我是個嶄新的靈魂
I came to this strange world
來到這個陌生(奇異)的世界
hoping I could learn a bit about how to give and take.
希望我能學習如何施與受
But since I came here
但從我到這來
felt the joy and the fear
感受到喜悅與畏懼
finding myself making every possible mistake
發現我自己犯盡了一切可能的錯
la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la...

I'm a young soul in this very strange world
在這個十分陌生(奇異)的世界我是一個年少{無知}的靈魂
hoping I could learn a bit about what is true and fake.
冀望我能學習一些 什麼是真實 什麼是虛偽
But why all this hate?
但為什麼淨是恨憤
Try to communicate
我試著溝通.
Finding trust and love is not alway easy to make.
了解信任與愛並不是容易可得的
la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la...

This is a happy end
這是個快樂的結局
cause'you don't understand
因為你不明白
everything you have done why's everything so wrong
你做的每件事就是為什麼每件事都如此錯誤
this is a happy end come and give me yourhand I'll take your far
away.
這是一個快樂的結局 將你的手交給我 我將帶你遠離{這世界}

I'm a new soul
我是個嶄新的靈魂
I came to this strange world
來到這個陌生(奇異)的世界
hoping I could learn a bit about how to give and take.
希望我能學習如何施與受
But since I came here
但從我到這來
felt the joy and the fear
感受到喜悅與畏懼
finding myself making every possible mistake
發現我自己犯盡了一切可能的錯

la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la...
I'm a new soul in this very strange world
在這個陌生(奇異)的世界 我是個嶄新的靈魂
Every possible mistake
一切可能的錯誤
Every possible mistake...
一切可能的錯誤
